name: Mona Token
description: Mona Token is an Ethereum-based token inspired by the 4chan meme, powered by Shibarium layer 2. Distributed. Though many have attempted, few have been successful. I'm here to usher in a brand-new era of decentralized money. Inspired by the 4chan meme. If short-term fomo can bring you happiness, then continuous game Happiness is your endless source.
